textJp: あっちの現場、可哀想だなぁ。」
textEn: I feel sorry for the guys on the scene."

textJp: 誰かキツメのタバコ、２箱くらい買ってきてくれません？」
textEn: Could someone go buy me two or so boxes of strong cigarettes?"

textJp: 「……今年は見事、見つけましたね。
…ひょっとすると、過去の失踪者もこんな感じで県外で殺されてたんすかね。」
このまま焼死の現場へ直行します！！」
textEn: "...We did an excellent job finding it this year.
...It could be that the people who disappeared in past years were scattered outside the prefecture like this too."
I'll head straight for the burned body's location!!"
